exec: var jsonObj = {"userPhone":JSON.parse(pm.environment.get("user")).userPhone,               "userPwd":JSON.parse(pm.environment.get("user")).userPwd              };var wordArray = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(JSON.stringify(jsonObj));var base64imei = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.stringify(wordArray);var jsonparam = {"data":base64imei,"key":"","zip":0};var paramvalue =  JSON.stringify(jsonparam);pm.environment.set("tgcParam", paramvalue);
